text: Diana DeGarmo (born June 16, 1987) is an American singer, songwriter and Broadway actress. She became known in 2004 on American Idol. She began a career in musical theater. She played Angelina in The Young and the Restless. DeGarmo was born in Birmingham, Alabama. ==References== Category:American Idol contestants Category:American pop singers Category:American singer- songwriters Category:American stage actors Category:Singers from Birmingham, Alabama Category:Actors from Birmingham, Alabama Category:Writers from Birmingham, Alabama Category:1987 births Category:Living people
title: Diana DeGarmo
